channel.title: Jet Li vs Jackie Chan
channel.description:
1. Who do you think's a better actor, and has better fight scenes.
2. Who would win in a real life fight between the two.
1. Hard to say who's a better actor, except Jet li's movies he fights faster than jackie chan does. 2. Jet li i think would win, hes younger, faster, and more Chinese.

item.description:
@tL wrote:

I prefer jet li, more serious actor and he was great in unleashed/danny the dog.

goatee:

item.title: Jet Li vs Jackie Chan
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

As far as acting goes, Jackie chan wins hands down. Most of the fighting he does has a sense of comedy to it. Jet Li I think is more disciplined in the martial arts and is has the age advantage on Jackie Chan, so he’d be a better fighter.

Read full topic

item.title: Jet Li vs Jackie Chan
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

jackie chan is 54 years old and Jet li is 45 so not that big of difference but jackie chan was more into movies and jet li was more into martial arts.

Jackie chan mini biography - Apprenticed to the China Drama Academy (or “opera school”) by his parents at the age of 6, Jackie Chan was rigorously trained in music, dance, and traditional martial arts. A visiting filmmaker offered Chan his first (tiny) role as a stunt player.

and jet li mini biography - Jet Li was Wushu (a martial art) world champion several times. He got his first part as a shaolin disciple in the film Shaolin Temple. He first attempt at directing, Zhong hua ying xiong (1986) (Born to defend), met with failure. But, it was good film regardless. Because it was the first time Jet directed and had more realistic fight scenes.

So in my opinion jet li would win because he is younger and was trained better in martial arts / trained longer.

Read full topic

item.title: Jet Li vs Jackie Chan
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I don’t think you can compare them. Jackie Chan plays in comedy movies most of the time, and Jet Li in action movies. But it’s quite obvious Jet Li would win because he is younger.
